archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.1.8: Upon termination or change of employment, internal or external individuals should be made aware of all information security responsibilities, specified in the terms and conditions of employment, that remain valid after employment has ended or changed.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
